title: Xscape Women's Long 3/4 Sleeve V-Neck Side Ruched Gown (Reg and Petite)
description: Model is wearing a size 4 dress. Size 4 measures approximately 61" from shoulder to hem.
Fits true to size for a perfect, comfortable fit.
Can be worn with any standard bra for easy, everyday comfort.
This dress is fitted at the waist and hips. The fabric has some stretch.
The modest design is enhanced by a cascading ruffle detail, offering an effortlessly chic look.

Feel confident in our Long Sleeve Scuba Ruched Side Dress. Crafted from luxurious Scuba Crepe and fully lined for comfort, it features a flattering V-neck, side ruffle details, and a hidden back zipper for a sleek finish. Perfect for a sophisticated, timeless look.
